ASRT Membership - Join or Renew

Thank you for your interest in ASRT membership. Please complete this application to join ASRT or to renew your membership.

There was an error processing your request. Please contact Member Services for assistance.
You have already successfully renewed your membership today.

If you need to change your contact or payment information, please call Member Services at 800-444-2778.

Membership Options

Automatically renew my membership each year!  
Never forget to renew your membership again! By selecting automatic renewal, you authorize ASRT to charge your credit card 30 days before your membership expiration date so you may continue receiving uninterrupted access to your member benefits.

DR Flex Plan™

The Directed Reading Flex plan™ gives you immediate access to 15 credits per year (18 credits with Premium Membership) of membership purchased, an extensive collection of Directed Readings, and the ability to use your credits when you want and how you want.

When choosing the DR Flex Plan™ and installment payments (where applicable), you will receive access to half of your CE credits immediately (7.5 CE credits, or 9 CE credits if you choose the Premium option). Access to the remaining credits will become available when the second installment is processed 90 days after the first payment.

 Compare Plans
Feature Traditional Plan DR Flex Plan™
Online journal access
Receive journal by mail
Annual cost of $125
Submit DR quizzes online or by mail
Unlimited tracking and transfer of credits
Access to any DR from ASRT’s catalog
Instant access to CE credits
Content in 0.25 and 0.5 CE credit increments
Read More About the Directed Reading Flex Plan™


Choose a Plan:

Join Date

Would you like your Join Date to be reset to today upon submitting your order? 
Active members have access to new and existing Directed Readings as part of their current membership period. Your join date and paid-through dates define your ASRT membership period.

Since your membership expired over three months ago, you may opt for a new membership period or extend the existing one.

If you wish to extend your current membership period, choose Yes. Otherwise, if you wish to start a new membership period, choose No and continue the process.

If you have any questions, contact our Member Services team at 800-444-2778 and they will assist you.
Yes No

Journal Preference

ASRT Chapters

Select Secondary Chapters

Premium Membership

For an additional $20 per year, you can enjoy the added benefits of Premium Membership.

Yes, I want the Premium membership option.

Premium Benefits
  • ASRT Insider Newsletter
  • Special Membership Card
  • Collectible Lapel Pin
  • Priority Call Routing
  • Additional Discounts
  • Immediate Access to 18 CE credits per year with DR Flex Plan™

The ASRT Foundation is the philanthropic arm of the ASRT. Donations are 100% tax-deductible.
